title: Wolfendoom Episodes - Total Conversion for Doom 2!
description:
A couple years back I found a neat TC for Doom 2 when I was looking for a Windows compatible version of the Wolfenstein and Spear of Destiny games called Wolfendoom. The creator of the Wolfendoom franchise painstakingly recreated every level in every official release of Wolfenstein ever into Doom 2 wads and hosted them on 3ddownloads, and then did some episodes of his own. Unfortunately, since the site hasn&#039;t been updated in five years and the links to the episodes now point to other files (usually Half-Life weapon monds) instead, I raped the internet searching for them.

So if you did what I did and ran to TPB first to see if there was a torrent with these in &#039;em, there is now.

Please note: I&#039;m not including Doom 2 in the torrent, and zdoom and the like should be readily accessible off of the web, and you should probably already have it. :P

Anyway, if you want more information on the actual episodes themselves, the link to the website is http://www.doomworld.com/wolfendoom/index2.html
